content.body:
We spent 6 months studying longevity research so you don't have to.

Here are the 3 habits that actually move the needle:

1. Sleep consistency beats sleep duration
2. Zone 2 cardio 3x/week outperforms daily intense workouts
3. Social connection is the most underrated longevity factor

Which one surprised you most?
